resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This cannot be undone
Do you want to use the last recording?
Persistent notification when recording sound and notification after it is complete
Tag your recordings with your current position
Recorder needs microphone permission to record audio
Recorder needs phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling
Recorder needs notifications permission to show recording controls
Recorder needs microphone permission to record audio and phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling
Recorder needs microphone permission to record audio and notifications permission to show recording controls
Recorder needs phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling and notifications permission to show recording controls
Recorder needs microphone permission to record audio, phone status access to prevent this app from recording while you\'re calling, and notifications permission to show recording controls
Recorder needs location permission to automatically tag your recordings to help you organise them
Required permissions were denied, enable them from Settings app to start recording
Location permission was denied, enable it from Settings app to tag your recordings
All your recordings will be shown here
Are you sure you want to delete all recordings? This cannot be undone
Are you sure you want to delete the selected recordings? This cannot be undone
